description.p: Manga reader for local files.
Supports zip, rar, tar, 7z, cbz, cbr, cbt, cb7 files and also folders.
Images are displayed in a vertical list and their size can be configured (fit width and/or height, user defined max width, original size).
Can set up multiple manga folders whose contents will be displayed in a tree view, from where they can be opened.
Can bookmark mangas.
Configurable keyboard shortcuts.
Add option to resize image after a short delay, prevents unnecesary resizes when resizing the window or the sidebar.
Changed text above the tree view to show the manga folder full path.
Fixed an issues causing bad images quality.
Fixed custom border color not being set.
Fix custom shortcuts for the viewer (next/previous image, scroll up/down) not being saved.
Use QImageReader to get the source sizes of images and use them to calculate the scaled sizes.
Before, the sizes were estimated from the loaded images, causing some minor issues.
Can now click and drag to scroll in the images viewer.
Code and build improvements.
Fixed a memory leak when loading a new manga (Mariusz Chryc)
Add actions/keyboard shortcuts to navigate to the next (right key) and previous images (left key). (Mariusz Chryc)
Add fit height and fit width options. (Mariusz Chryc)
Changed single page zoom, now increases/decreases the current zoom level, rather than setting it to fixed values.
Add zoom support.

ul.li: middle click image to toggle zoom for that image
ctrl + scroll up/down (or ctrl + +/-) to zoom in/out all images
actions (menu bar and tool bar) to zoom in/out

description.p: Use unrar to extract rar files.
Add actions to focus the manga tree, bookmaks table and manga view
Open manga with enter from manga tree and bookmarks table.
Set open file/folder as window title.
Remember menu bar and tool bar visibility.
Fix manga tree and bookmarks table resizing when toggling to fullscreen and back.
Added rename option to the context menu of the tree view item.
Added context menu to bookmarks.
Added go to page widget in the toolbar.
Fixed bugs related to saving and deleting bookmarks.
Fixed bugs related to deleting manga folders.
Open archives and folders directly and through command line.
Scroll with up and down arrow keys (keys can be changed).
Fix recursive bookmarks not being deleted.
Fix tree not being setup when first adding a manga folder.
Fix not saving active manga folder after adding it.
Fix crash when switching active manga folder, caused by the manga tree not being setup.
Fix index out of range error when checking if previous and next pages are in view.
Improved the adding and removing of manga folders.
Show more archive types in the folder tree.
Show page numbers instead of the index in the bookmarks table.
Fixes to folder tree.
First release.
